General.Name: Applied DB Public Company Limited
General.Description: Applied DB Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes plastic compounds, adhesives, and sealants in Thailand, Nigeria, Kenya, Singapore, the Philippines, Bangladesh, Myanmar, Vietnam, and internationally. It operates through three segments: Plastic Compound, Adhesive, and Sealant & DIY. The company's plastic compound products include soft polyvinyl chloride (PVC), rigid PVC, and pharmaceutical grade compounds, as well as polypropylene split yarns. Its adhesive products comprise contact, graft, polyurethane (PU), vinyl, and epoxy adhesives, as well as thinners, primers, and hardeners. The company's sealant products include acetic silicone, neutral silicone, acrylic, super nail construction, and PU sealants, as well as water-based construction adhesives. It also offers DIY products comprising super glues, RTV gasket makers, household adhesives and sealants, epoxy adhesives and putties, and specialist products. The company serves wire and cable, real estate and construction, medical, furniture and general wood, automotive, shoes and leather, and other industries, as well as household users. Applied DB Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.
